targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  entity_id AS metric,
  temperature
FROM $uht_table t
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and t.entity_id = '${uht_device:raw}'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  entity_id AS metric,
  humidity
FROM $uht_table t
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and t.entity_id = '${uht_device:raw}'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  doorcontact as "State"
FROM $doorsensor_table t
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and t.entity_id = '${doorsensor_device:raw}'
ORDER BY 1 desc
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time_index, '15m') AS "time",  
  entity_id AS metric,
  count(personid) as value  
FROM $wifisensor_table t 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_index) and t.entity_id = '${wifisensor_device:raw}'  
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(time_index, '15m')

SELECT DISTINCT time, entity_id as "Device", t.state as "State"
FROM
  (SELECT MAX(time_index) AS "time", entity_id as "Device"
  FROM $lamp_table as t
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time_index)
  GROUP BY entity_id
  ORDER BY MAX(time_index) desc) l, 
  $lamp_table t
WHERE time = t.time_index AND entity_id = t.entity_id

SELECT DISTINCT time, entity_id as "Device", t.state as "State"
FROM
  (SELECT MAX(time_index) AS "time", entity_id as "Device"
  FROM $airconditioner_table as t
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time_index)
  GROUP BY entity_id
  ORDER BY MAX(time_index) desc) l, 
  $airconditioner_table t
WHERE time = t.time_index AND entity_id = t.entity_id

SELECT DISTINCT time, entity_id as "Device", t.state as "State"
FROM
  (SELECT MAX(time_index) AS "time", entity_id as "Device"
  FROM $doorlocker_table as t
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time_index)
  GROUP BY entity_id
  ORDER BY MAX(time_index) desc) l, 
  $doorlocker_table t
WHERE time = t.time_index AND entity_id = t.entity_id

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  entity_id AS metric,
  lat, long
FROM $vehicle_table t
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_index) and t.entity_id = '${vehicle_device:raw}'
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1
